complete.check_status_comment: You can check the status right now by clicking the link.
complete.tx_broadcast_network: After 12 confirmations of Ethereum network and 2/3 + 1 confirmations from witnesses, ${amount} ${token} will be minted and sent to your IoTeX address:
complete.tx_broadcast_network.xrc20: After 1 confirmation of IoTeX network and 2/3 + 1 confirmations from witnesses, your XRC20 token will be burnt and ${tokenName} will be sent to your ETH wallet:
contract.install: Please use ioPay desktop, import & unlock your wallet, and then refresh this page to continue.
beta_notice: THIS PRODUCT IS IN BETA. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK.
may_delay_comment: * may delay due to ETH network congestion.
warning.eth.comment: To convert from ERC20 to XRC20, please open in a supported browser (Firefox/Chrome/Brave) with metamask installed.
warning.iotx.comment.mobile: To convert from XRC20 to ERC20, please open inside ioPay Android/iOS for mobile users.
tutorial.summary: is the cross-chain + multi-asset bridge to connect IoTeX to the blockchain universe! ioTube will enable new assets and liquidity from other blockchains to flow into IoTeX and position IoTeX to deliver unique IoT assets to other blockchains in the future.
tutorial.convert_ERC20: Convert your ERC20 assets and bring new liquidity to the IoTeX Network now at:
tutorial.send_from_ethereum_to_iotex: Send ERC20 tokens from Ethereum to IoTeX Blockchain
tutorial.purpose_of_operation: The purpose of this operation is to lock a certain amount of an ERC20 token on Ethereum, and create an equivalent amount of IoTeX version (XRC20) of the same token on the IoTeX blockchain.
tutorial.one.title: 1. Make sure you have Metamask Plugin installed in your browser
tutorial.one.body: The purpose of this operation is to lock a certain amount of an ERC20 token on Ethereum, and create an equivalent amount of IoTeX version (XRC20) of the same token on the IoTeX blockchain.
tutorial.two.title: 2. Open and connect to ioTube dApp
tutorial.two.body.two: Click the “Ethereum” Tab to select Ethereum Blockchain as the source network
tutorial.two.body.three: Click “Connect Wallet” link to allow IoTube to connect to your Metamask wallet
tutorial.three.title: 3. Select the ERC20 token you want to send to IoTeX
tutorial.three.body: From the dropdown, select which ERC20 token you want to move convert from Ethereum to IoTeX. If your favorite token is not listed, feel free to
tutorial.three.body.submit: submit your request to the team.
tutorial.four.title: 4. Select the amount of tokens you want to move
tutorial.four.body.one: Select the amount of ERC20 tokens you want to move
tutorial.four.body.three: Confirm the Approve transaction in Metamask
tutorial.four.body.four: that the destination wallet address can be unlocked on the destination blockchain using the same private key of the sender address
tutorial.four.body.five: and sign the transfer in Metamask:
tutorial.four.body.final: After the transaction is confirmed on Ethereum, your ERC20 tokens will be “locked” in an Ethereum smart contract, while the same amount of the equivalent XRC20 token will be “minted” on the IoTeX blockchain. This means the circulating supply of the ERC20 token you converted will stay the same, taking into account versions from both Ethereum and IoTeX blockchains!
tutorial.four.body.congratulation: Congratulations! You just moved some liquidity from Ethereum to IoTeX!
tutorial.five.title: 5. Check the destination account on IoTeX
tutorial.five.body.unlock_xrc20: XRC20 tokens can be unlocked utilizing the same private key as the sender address on Ethereum
tutorial.five.body.start: The destination address for the converted
tutorial.five.body.end: to unlock the destination address and check the new token balance:
tutorial.convert_XRC20.title: Convert XRC20 tokens from IoTeX to Ethereum
tutorial.convert_XRC20.operation: You can also perform the opposite operation, sending converted XRC20 tokens from the IoTeX blockchain back to Ethereum:
tutorial.convert_XRC20.one: If you are on Desktop, then make sure you have ioPay Desktop open and unlocked when accessing
tutorial.convert_XRC20.two.start: If you are on Mobile, then open
tutorial.convert_XRC20.two.end: directly inside the ioPay Mobile Wallet (in the Discover tab)
tutorial.convert_XRC20.three.start: Follow the same steps as listed about to convert ERC20 assets to IoTeX, except make sure to select
tutorial.convert_XRC20.three.middle: as the source network (i.e., IoTeX will be listed on the left as shown below). You will be asked to sign the
tutorial.convert_XRC20.three.end: transactions which you will do in ioPay (not Metamask)!
tutorial.questions.title: Questions?
tutorial.questions.body: Please reach out to us on Telegram with any questions:
